definitions.definition: Waste or misapplication of the assets of a deceased person by an executor or administrator ; devastation .
In full , writ of devastavit : a writ issued against an executor or administrator claiming compensation for such misapplication of assets.

main_definition: ( property law ) Waste or misapplication of the assets of a deceased person by an executor or administrator ; devastation .
secondary_definitions: ( property law ) In full , writ of devastavit : a writ issued against an executor or administrator claiming compensation for such misapplication of assets.
